website_summaries.verdict: This cozy robe, available in festive patterns, is the perfect addition to your winter warmth wardrobe for lounging around the house.
pros: Available in cute and funky patterns alike
Belted robe comes down to ankles in length on most
While this robe offers supreme warmth, softness, and comfort, it is not bulky or cumbersome
Doesn’t shed or get linty and washes well
cons: Arms may be short in length for anyone who has long arms

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: SO THIN. The quality is awful. I returned it. I can practically see my fingers through the fabric as I touch it. I feel like the elbows will wear through in a few weeks. I have already made the mistake of buying a cheap robe on amazon and it only lasted a few months before completely falling apart. Returned this to find a robe that is actually thick and warm for Chicago winters.
customer_reviews.author: SlavCentral

customer_reviews.title: Runs big. Even for a onsie.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4”, 113 lbs. Based on another customers answer to a question i asked about size, i bought a small. It’s comfy and VERY SOFT. But i probably should’ve bought an xs. This after washing per instructions on garment.
customer_reviews.author: Watton

customer_reviews.title: Great robe at great price
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I, of course, hesitated when choosing the size I should get. I went with the size chart. I am satisfied with the fit. I am 5'8" and 130 lbs. This size fits well. The arms go right past my wrists, the length is a little lower than mid-calf, the overlap is just right (not too much, not too little). It's soft, light weight, and warm enough. I am happy with my purchase. Oh, and I have not yet washed it, so I can't say anything about it holding up in the wash, although it seems well made and sturdy. I think I will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, light-weight AND WARM!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my robe so much that I ordered a 2nd one for my daughter. She loves hers as much as I love mine! They are light-weight yet soft, cozy, and warm. My old dog needs out every morning about 4:00 am, and I wear my robe when I let her out. The robe keeps me as warm as a coat during those COLD winter morning excursions - even in Alaska!! My daughter's robe arrived without the tie belt, but the seller was very courteous and quick to ship the belt. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: aklittlered

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large.  Really Large.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, soft, cuddly, cozy and gigantic. I'm 5'0 & 100#. The XS has hips that measure about 44 inches. My hips are 33 inches. The crotch hung down to my mid thigh. The bust area was about 38 inches. Designed to be "roomy" not doubt; however, not for Petite women.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: After buying my boyfriend a PajamaMania robe for Christmas, I got jealous seeing him bundled up in it so, I bought one for myself. The material is super soft and cozy. Arrived on time and it was a good price! I think I have long arms or something because most long sleeved things end up being shorter than I would like but, this fits perfect. I'm about 5'4" and 150 lbs, a large is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love these Pj’s
customer_reviews.text: Love these Pj’s. Nice and cozy for the cold months. I’m 5 foot seven 138lbs. Got a medium after reviewing the chart, but it’s to snug when you raise ur arms. So I’m returning for a large :)
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value but Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness of this robe. It's a great value for the money. I wish I would have ordered a size up. I'm 5' 8" and weigh 128 lbs. I always wear a small, and that's what I ordered. However, the size small robe does not have enough fullness to it, and the sleeves are a little short. I would have also liked it to be a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Warm but Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6”, 36DDD and 170 pounds. I bought the XL and it fits fine with plenty of room. It is comfortable and warm. What I don’t like is that it is cheaply made. The pockets are two squares of material that are stuck to the front of the robe, which means they are not very durable. I ripped one of the pockets soon after purchase and I barely use the pockets. There is also a tab you can use to hook onto a robe hook. If you want a warm robe and don’t want to spend a lot of money, this robe is sufficient, just don’t expect it to last.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good quality, good fit
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe! I was a little hesitant to purchase after so many said it was so thin oh, but it is not. It's not thick and bulky, but is plenty warm enough. I love the feel, is very soft. The sleeves are a little short for me, but that's okay because they don't go into the sink when I'm washing dishes as my last one did. Honestly, I think it is a good price as well as a good product. If you are looking for winter jacket this is not for you, but it is warm enough to keep the chill off. My house is usually around 65 degrees and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, great value and hold up after washing.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality robe, even after washing for the first time. I washed it delicate cycle with my favorite fleece blanket and some pillow covers. Held up beautifully. Fits as expected. I normally wear a small and sometimes a medium if I want a looser fit, but the small works perfectly. I think I will buy my sister one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: meishan

customer_reviews.title: Yummy fluffy warm awesomeness. Neck opening too high.
customer_reviews.text: Yummy fluffy warm awesomeness. I sized up for baggy comfort and it is delicious. But the neck opening is too close to my neck for me. I occasionally unzip a little and then the zipper edges rub annoyingly against my beck and chest. If not for that, and for the fact that it's just a *little* too warm, I'd give it 5 stars. I'm tempted to give it 4 stars even with the annoying neck/zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Lisabet

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, attractive robe at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This robe is very comfortable. It's long enough, wide enough, and has good sturdy pockets that you can actually put things (like your cellphone) in safely. The robe material is very warm and snuggly--perfect for a cold night or day. If you wear it, say, outside in the sun while you're puttering around on a Sunday, you might find yourself to be somewhat sweaty (I did). But it does the job that it's designed for very well, and I'd definitely buy it again. I also like that the animal print (leopard?) is interesting but not over-the-top. The robe doesn't look or feel cheap in any way, but was a quite reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Lambert

customer_reviews.title: The softest robe ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this Fleece Robe. It is very soft, comfortable, warm and snuggly. It does run small so order one to two sizes up - I am size 14 and the XL fits on the shoulders and arms but is a little tight around the body. The colors are nice and vibrant, just as shown on the picture. It washes well - no shedding, fuzzballs or lint. It does get really static though.
customer_reviews.author: R. O.

customer_reviews.title: Fun warm robe. Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews about the size and ordered a medium where I normally would have ordered a small..The medium is definitely roomy but isn't too large, so it is a good choice here. As the for robe, it's playful fun in design and does a fine job of keeping warmth in. Had it for about 2 months and it seems to be of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Groundhog

customer_reviews.title: LOVE This Fleece Onsie!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this fleece onesie-it’s so comfy and warm. I’m so happy with the one I purchased, I’m planning to buy another one. People have stated that it runs really small or too large. I’ve found it’s runs true to size. I’m 5’8” and 130lbs and the large fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SDA

customer_reviews.title: Love My Robe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe! When I first got it I almost sent it back because I wanted something thicker and heavier material. Then I thought how that would make me look even heavier. It's surprisingly warm and I'm always cold. I'm about 145lbs 5'1. I got the large and it wraps way around. I might have been able to get away with a medium but I like my robes big. I got the pink. The color is subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Warm, and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been extremely pleased with the quality, weight, and durability of this bathrobe. I bought it before I had surgery and I now wear it every day. I have washed it numerous times and it always comes out of the dryer fluffy and soft. It feels very luxurious and it is heavy for those cold and windy nights. I keep my thermostat fairly low to conserve energy and this robe has been wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Karmy

customer_reviews.title: WARMTH
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have worn them all week and they sure keep me warm I would recommend them to anyone who wants to keep warm on the chilly nights. The fit is perfect though I did order a bigger size because I twist and turn quite a bit when I sleep. I am so used to PJ coming unbuttoned it was a relief to sleep in a zippered up onesie.
customer_reviews.author: Sara34232

customer_reviews.title: THE COLORS ON THIS ROBE ARE EXQUISITE!
customer_reviews.text: This Panamanian women’s Robe caught my attention because of the color which is true to the photo you see online. The white of the robe is a true white with a pink lavender that makes a beautiful pattern. The robe is soft, comfortable and truly luxurious. The only con that I can think of is that it is just about impossible to match the lavender. However, I think a long white, cotton nightgown would be perfect. I am currently looking for the long white nightgown. Wearing this robe make feel like I am a queen - special!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal's Corner

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight robe, forgot to include belt
customer_reviews.text: Update to 1st review: Excellent customer service. They contacted me here regarding the belt and sent one out right away. Thank you, it's nice to see a company that stands by their products. I purchased this for my mom for Christmas. Good quality, not a heavy robe, but still nice. There was no belt with it, not sure why it wasn't included.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable and has a really nice look
customer_reviews.text: Looks as nice as it does in the photos. Wife thinks it is really warm, in fact she is waiting until it gets colder to wear it. Which is strangle as she is very cool natured. I agree with others than getting one size up makes sense. This is not because it runs small, but to give you that comfy, roomy feeling. Small would worked as well if I was going for form fitting and not lounging around the house. Nice length and the way the loops and belt are designed make them sit in place when not in use. Very happy with this purchase and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: W. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Cozy robe with a good price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase of the soft white/gray snowflake robe. It fits well and lots of room for closure. Right price for a very pretty, warm and soft robe. I ordered my regular size and it fit perfect. I did wash the robe per directions, and it came out beautiful. Great robe for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Its cute
customer_reviews.text: I like it, its comfy and soft but is not for wearing directly out of the shower or any water. We have a hot tub and I get cold very easy so the only thing I did not like was it didn't absorb the water very well so every time a wet spot hit me it made me jump. Need to towel dry urself first then put it on.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sutorius

customer_reviews.title: Adorable & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We love these! Pockets are great for bumming around the house with your phone in the pocket. Super soft & comfortable. Sticking is perfect & well done. Have washed several times and still look & feel brand new.
customer_reviews.author: SALCurrier

customer_reviews.title: warm, lightweight, doesn't shed
customer_reviews.text: This robe is lightweight, warm, and cozy. Unlike the last three similar robes I bought from different manufacturers, this did not shed, even on the first wash. The other robes all ruined every article of clothing I washed with them, no matter how many times they got washed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: MSL

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT weight and size.
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe. It's so soft. It fits PERFECT. It's not that thick thick material. It's just right weight. Like I said . Just PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: louise edwards

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT pandemic uniform!
customer_reviews.text: I wore out my old robe, as it is worn both morning, noon and night these days during the pandemic. This is lighter weight than my old thick Winter robe, which is perfect as the days are getting warmer. Perfect pandemic uniform!
customer_reviews.author: gidget

customer_reviews.title: ... to give this one a try since I didn't like what they offered in stores
customer_reviews.text: I'm skeptical about buying clothing on the Internet- especially Amazon -but I decided to give this one a try since I didn't like what they offered in stores. This road is extremely soft and comfortable I washed it right away after receiving it, dried it on low, and it held it shape and softness.
customer_reviews.author: erica3g

customer_reviews.title: Very nice robe. I got the purple damask print
customer_reviews.text: Very nice robe. I got the purple damask print. It is very pretty, and the robe is very nice and warm and soft. This would not make a good bath robe as the fabric would not be absorbant.But it is heavenly as a warm snuggly robe. You do want to wash it by itself for a while as it would leave lint on other clothes.
customer_reviews.author: OMEvans

customer_reviews.title: Soft, fluffy and warm robe.
customer_reviews.text: I love my soft, fluffy and warm robe. It is well made. It is warm yet lightweight. The belt could be a little bit longer but other than that this is really nice. I haven"t laundered it yet so I can't rate that. Being that the robe is well made I don't foresee a problem.
customer_reviews.author: P. McCuen

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I adore this lovely and super soft robe. The quality is very very nice. I'm petite, 5' 0" and I got the medium to give me lots of room but it is a bit big but not too much but I could've easily gotten the small. I will buy another for my daughter I love it so much. Looking forward to winter and my cozy robe!
customer_reviews.author: Rockweazel

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a robe that will keep me warm in this cold house. I really wanted something thick. This gives me warmth without being too thick and uncomfortable. I like really large robes so I can have a lot of coverage. I ordered a large and realized I probably could have gone with a medium. I am 5'4 and 140 lbs. This is a fantastic robe it's super soft and I haven't taken it off since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customised

customer_reviews.title: Small fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday so just a quick observation.. I was worried the smal might be too small but it’s perfect. The arm length and general length are great and there are no issues with the belt size. One issue is that the fabric was frayed in one section but I didn’t feel like returning it because the first time I ordered this, it wasn’t delivered. The material is very warm and not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Barket

customer_reviews.title: comfy, cozy, cute
customer_reviews.text: so soft and fits as expected. Sleeves are a good length. If you have long arms, the sleeves might be a tad short. It only got 4 stars simply because of its thickness. My day to day fleece robe is thicker which I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Wanted in a Robe
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe. Super soft and I feel like I'm enveloped in comfort. Even though it's lightweight, its warm. I have had and worn it for a few months and am very happy with this purchase. I've washed it several times and each time I pull it out of the dryer, it looks and feels just like it did when I first opened the package. I love coffee and so the design is right on point.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews of this robe and decided to take a chance since returns were free and the price was right. I’m very pleased. One reviewer said the material was thin, but I find it just right. It’s comfy and cute and fits as expected with none of the reported sleeve length issues. A great buy. I’d recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LizArm

customer_reviews.title: My favorite PJ's EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a pair of onsie PJ's. These are so comfortable and so warm!! They fit me perfectly!! I'm afraid to dry them, because if they shrink even a little they won't fit anymore, but I wash them in cold and hang dry them, they actually dry really quickly! They are perfect for cold winter nights!!
customer_reviews.author: Little Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: Loose fitting- Zipper is defective on the one I got.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how large this runs. I normally am between a M/L, so I ordered a large, but it was too big. Very baggy on me. I should've gotten the medium. If you're between sizes, maybe try sizing down. Nice onesie. Comfortable. Defective zipper makes it hard to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Opinionated

customer_reviews.title: If you like everything covered in lint, buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: This robe is soft and cozy, so I'll give it that. I went up a size and it fit well. The problem is lint. Lint everywhere. Lint when you take it out of the box. Lint if you attempt to wear it. Lint. Lint. Lint. My house was coated in the 10 minutes of trying it out. Based on other reviews (that I wish I would have read first) it will never stop making everything covered in lint. So I'm returning it. It's super cute and even my kids loved the color, but wowzers the lint.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this bathrobe. It is made well and has held up well. The colors haven't faded after a year or more of wear. It is a bit heavier but perfect for the three colder seasons.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Robe!!!
customer_reviews.text: This robe really is truly soft and plush. The pockets are nice and large. In the front, there is no "V" split below the belt. It covers completely. Normally I would not order an animal print but the details and price were right on spot so I could not resist. I am glad I did not. I really love this robe and will look for this manufacturer (Pajama Mania) in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to the "size up" advice!
customer_reviews.text: This robe is amazing- super soft and very cozy. The thing is, I bought a large after reading all the reviews (I'm 5'2, 120lbs) and it is huge! I should've ordered my regular size small. I'm keeping anyways because I can just tie it tighter and I don't feel like going through the exchange process but I wanted to review it so others didn't make the same mistake! Ps- my 6'5, 200lb husband fits this size large perfectly :)
customer_reviews.author: Katherine G.

customer_reviews.title: This runs REALLY small so read the reviews! Based ...
customer_reviews.text: This runs REALLY small so read the reviews! Based on what I read, I got a size Large, even though I'm usually a small. It fits perfectly and it's really comfy and warm. I have been wearing it around the house daily since it got colder and it's really cosy.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8 and about 145lbs. I normally would get a medium but thought I'd size up to a large. It feels a tiny bit big but if I had gotten the medium - the arm length would likely have been too short. For that reason, I'm happy with the large. I love the design and the feel of the material. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lesia

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8 and about 150 lbs. I got the XL based on other reviews. It fits great, not snug, but not overly large on me either. That's how I like my robes. It's super soft and the pockets are large enough to hold a cell phone. It's warm without being heavy. I'm enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: M. N. OlsonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3" and 110 pounds. Was worried about sizing, so ordered a Medium. It is a little large, but there is plenty of room to put this on on top of your jammies! The belt is a little short but still ties into a bow. Love the colors and how bright it is. Can't help but smile when you wear it. Super soft!
customer_reviews.author: pmirkovich

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Cozy Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in extra small for my 12 and a half year old, tall granddaughter for Christmas this year and she loves it! I was a bit concerned that it would be too big but it fit well, with a little room to grow. It's made well and reasonably priced. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ~*~ Sunshine ~*~

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for a long, super soft robe for Christmas. This one did not disappoint. Not sure if I’ve seen her wearing much of anything else since she took it out of the box on Christmas morning....should I be worried?
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft, and too big
customer_reviews.text: The rope feels like you are wearing a blanket. I ordered the large (I am a size 10) and I am drowning in it. Not used to that, but it is growing on me having the extra room. I love how soft and light it is, definitely keeps you warm. Not the best quality, had it two weeks and one of the pockets is ripping off. Nothing I cant fix with a needle and thread. I still like the robe, especially for the price. It is a great length.
customer_reviews.author: SmartAunt

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty robe, looks just like the photo here. It fit as expected, perhaps a bit larger if anything. It is soft. I would say it is thin to medium weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright beginnings
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute robe that will definitely brighten your mornings. A far cry from my blah colored but monogrammed robes I usually purchase. The sash seemed short for a XL size. This is definitely not an in-between seasons robe. The 100% polyester fabric will keep you toasty but doesn't breath like the cotton terry cloth robes I've had in the past. Great robe to take off the morning chill.
customer_reviews.author: jb white

customer_reviews.title: I love this robe especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe especially for the price! I gave it 4 stars because even though it's a great deal, it's a little thinner and shorter than I was hoping. The size proportions are a little strange. I ordered an XL based on other reviews that it runs small and it's way too large in the stomach (it almost wraps all the way around to my back) but the arm length and overall length is shorter than it shows in the pictures. Despite the minor flaws, the price can't be beat, and I'd purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Liz F

customer_reviews.title: Love how warm and comfortable it is!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: customer service is the best glad to see that an awesome company will take care of there customers they offered to send me a new one to replace the one with the rip! Love this thing defiately keeps me warm on cold days here, only complaint I have it that it came to me ripped and I can't sew to save my life, but I love the warmth too much to give it up
customer_reviews.author: Jessa Patience

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Thick
customer_reviews.text: This robe is for a gift so I opened to check the quality and am very happy. This robe is so soft and plenty of thick. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rita B.

customer_reviews.title: came damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I received there was a hole along the seam in the back, had to look for something else because it was a Christmas present and when I went to reorder they were sold out. I could have repaired the hole but for the price I did not think the quality or quality control was great.
customer_reviews.author: HellBell

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this bathrobe! Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bathrobe! I chose it, because the beautiful print and reviews said it was soft. Boy is it soft, my kids love cuddling up to me when wearing it. It has a nice cut so it flatters your figure, unlike some bathrobes. I have washed several times, doesn't shead or pill. Very happy with this! I am thinking of buying more for gifts since the quality is so good.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke D

customer_reviews.title: Don't order two sizes up!
customer_reviews.text: I got freaked out by so many reviews suggesting to buy two sizes larger, but that was a mistake. I am 5'5", 150 pounds, 38B. I ordered the XL which is swimming on me. Shoulder seam hanging off an extra 2" on each arm. I wish I had chosen a large, or perhaps even my normal size, a medium. If you have extra wide shoulders or extra large bra size, you may want to go up one size more than your usual. The color is good and it is soft and comfortable, and I suppose a bathrobe isn't supposed to win a beauty contest, but this looks ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Polka Dot robe
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I'm 5"10 and sleeves were long enough! They aren't super roomy, but it fits well over my pajamas. Size was perfect on me. Length might be shorter then on others because I'm tall, but it's fine for me! Would highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: L. Paolano

customer_reviews.title: I'M SURE MOM WILL LOVE IT AS MUCH AS I DO!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! THIS ROBE IS BEAUTIFUL AND SO SOFT!! GREAT QUALITY TOO. IT'S GOING TO BE A MOTHER'S DAY GIFT FOR MY MIL . I SURE HOPE I BOUGHT THE RIGHT SIZE! BUT EVEN IF I DIDN'T, THE COMPANY OFFERS FREE RETURNS/EXCHANGES. THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: KIM KRIEGER

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!! I'm in my third trimester of pregnancy and cannot always get all the way ready fast enough to let the dog out to go potty. This definitely helps me cover up easy before getting 100% ready. Would like more color options.
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them already!
customer_reviews.text: Softest robe ever! My husband and I got matching ones and it’s our favorite on Sunday morning to just lounge in them! 30 going on 70 lol
customer_reviews.author: Natashia

customer_reviews.title: Warm and lightweight..perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the second robe like this I've purchased. I love the long length, it's lightweight but so warm and cozy. In the winter we keep our heat on 65 and I never get cold when I have this robe on. I'm 5'5" and 115 lbs. the medium fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Debra B. Magann

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. I wear it whenever I’m home. I bought the winter pattern so it’s very festive! I believe I bought the medium and I’m 150 lbs and 5’3”
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: had a mysterious brown stain on the inside and smelled strongly like softener. Did not have tags attached
customer_reviews.text: Robe came used and filthy. It had holes in the inseam of the arms, had a mysterious brown stain on the inside and smelled strongly like softener. Did not have tags attached. Very disappointed with this choice especially knowing it was sold by the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good colors, watch sizing
customer_reviews.text: Have CRPS and wanted something light and not scratchy on skin, but still snuggly and cuddly. This is great. I am thin, but ordered a M. Love dots!!! Cheers me up! Have not washed yet, but would hang dry. Sash is tooooo short, even on M with a tiny waist.
customer_reviews.author: JTL

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SOFT & COZY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bathrobe for my daughter & it is super cute, soft and cozy. I am very happy with my purchase. She loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: S.S

customer_reviews.title: Size runs very large.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a loosely fitting bathrobe but this one is large enough for 3 of me. It is very soft however, Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

product_meta.title: PajamaMania Women's Plush Fleece Long Bathrobes, Hooded Sherpa-Lined Robes
feature_bullets: Soft, plush fleece in a variety of playful prints perfect to throw on after a bath, spa day or lounging around the house all winter long

HOODED BATHROBE: Hooded bath robe features 2 front patch pockets large enough to hold your cell phone, attached inner ties, hanger loop, removable tie belt and plush sherpa fleece-lined hood, trim and cuffs. Available in several different patterns and colors including solid black, plaid, winter scenes, polka dots and stars

ROBE WITHOUT HOOD: Non-hooded bathrobe features 2 front patch pockets large enough to hold your cell phone, attached inner ties, hanger loop and removable tie belt. Available in several different patterns including solids, fair isle, snowflakes, polka dots, diamonds, plaid and stars
Sizing information: Fits clothing sizes—XS (0-2), S (4-6), M (8-10), L (12-14), XL (16-18), 2X (20-22). See sizing chart for more information
Care instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Do not iron
